gobblin.source.extractor.extract

Interface SourceSpecificLayer<S,D>

  • Type Parameters:
    D - type of data record
    S - type of schema
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RestApiExtractor

    public interface SourceSpecificLayer<S,D>
    An interface for source extractors

      • getRecordSetFromSourceApi

        Iterator<D> getRecordSetFromSourceApi(String schema,
                                      String entity,
                                      WorkUnit workUnit,
                                      List<Predicate> predicateList)
                               throws IOException
        Get records using source specific api (Example: bulk api in salesforce source) record set: data records with an iterator
        Parameters:
        source - schema name
        source - entity name
        work - unit: properties
        list - of all predicates that needs to be applied
        Returns:
        iterator with set of records
        Throws:
        SchemaException - if there is anything wrong in getting data records
        IOException
